issue.title: protobuf ParseFromString function return value not checked

content.raw: This has been a long standing problem with the gazebo's transport mechanism. We'd do well to add a check on the `parseFromString` return type. However, I'd rather see our time spent integrating ignition-transport into Gazebo than fixing this bug.
content.html: This has been a long standing problem with the gazebo's transport mechanism. We'd do well to add a check on the parseFromString return type. However, I'd rather see our time spent integrating ignition-transport into Gazebo than fixing this bug.
